member.summary: Create an instance with the default options settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.DeveloperExceptionPageOptions.SourceCodeLineCount
member.summary: Determines how many lines of code to include before and after the line of code present in an exception's stack frame. Only applies when symbols are available and source code referenced by the exception stack trace is present on the server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.DeveloperExceptionPageOptions.FileProvider
member.summary: Provides files containing source code used to display contextual information of an exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for enabling .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, and re-execute the request in an alternate pipeline. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, reset the request path, and re-execute the request. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder})
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, and re-execute the request in an alternate pipeline. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerExtensions.UseExceptionHandler(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerOptions)
member.summary: Adds a middleware to the pipeline that will catch exceptions, log them, and re-execute the request in an alternate pipeline. The request will not be re-executed if the response has already started.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerOptions.ExceptionHandlingPath
member.summary: The path to the exception handling endpoint. This path will be used when executing the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerOptions.ExceptionHandler
member.summary: The that will handle the exception. If this is not explicitly provided, the subsequent middleware pipeline will be used by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ExceptionHandlerOptions.AllowStatusCode404Response
member.summary: This value controls whether the should consider a response with a 404 status code to be a valid result of executing the . The default value is false and the middleware will consider 404 status codes to be an error on the server and will therefore rethrow the original exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for enabling .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesOptions)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the given options that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with a default response handler that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Func{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.StatusCodeContext,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the specified handler that checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware with the specified response body to send. This may include a '{0}' placeholder for the status code. The middleware checks for responses with status codes between 400 and 599 that do not have a body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePagesWithRedirects(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline. Specifies that responses should be handled by redirecting with the given location URL template. This may include a '{0}' placeholder for the status code. URLs starting with '~' will have PathBase prepended, where any other URL will be used as is.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePages(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder})
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline with the specified alternate middleware pipeline to execute to generate the response body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesExtensions.UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StatusCodePages middleware to the pipeline. Specifies that the response body should be generated by re-executing the request pipeline using an alternate path. This path may contain a '{0}' placeholder of the status code.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesOptions
member.summary: Options for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a default which produces a plaintext response containing the status code and the reason phrase.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.StatusCodePagesOptions.HandleAsync
member.summary: The handler that generates the response body for the given . By default this produces a plain text response that includes the status code.
